title: Super Idol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **I know you don't think you're all that great** — Weaken another player each night. At the start of the next day, they will be given a new rolecard that is a slightly weaker version of their role, as determined by the host.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**But I'm just blown away by you every day** — You will be informed of new roles of your weakened targets when they get their new rolecards during the day.
**You live in your own amazing way** — Weakened players will have the option to deal a Powerful attack at night instead of taking their night action. They may only do this once.
**You're never swayed to give up, your passion's blazing like a flame** — If a weakened player successfully kills someone, at the start of their next day, they'll be given a new rolecard that's a significantly stronger version of their original role, as determined by the host. You will be informed of the new role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: **Like a flame, how you warm me up** — Have two strengthened players win the game.

desc:

*I'll give you a hundred five percent of my love—won't you be mine too?*
